title: Totally Sidetalkin'
itunes:title: Totally Sidetalkin'
author: podcasting@panic.com (Panic)
description: How the Nokia N-Gage failed so spectacularly that it became a meme before social media really existed. And what that has to do with Panic, exactly.
content:encoded:
How the Nokia N-Gage failed so spectacularly that it became a meme before social media really existed. And what that has to do with Panic, exactly.

  • Sidetalking.com
